name: Morning Exercise
description: Do 30 minutes of exercise every morning before 8 AM

name: Read Books
description: Read for at least 30 minutes daily - currently reading 'Atomic Habits'

name: Meditation
description: Practice mindfulness meditation for 15 minutes using Headspace

name: Drink Water
description: Drink at least 2.5 liters of water throughout the day

name: Weekly Gym
description: Go to gym 4 times per week - strength training focus

name: Learn Coding
description: Practice coding for 2 hours daily - currently learning React & Node.js

name: Healthy Eating
description: Eat balanced meals with 5+ servings of fruits and vegetables

name: Morning Walk
description: Take a 20-minute walk in the park every morning

name: Journal Writing
description: Write 3 things I'm grateful for each evening
